settings.title: american woolen company
settings.text_1: founded in 1899, American Woolen Company in Stafford Springs, CT is the only remaining US mill capable of producing the highest quality wool fabricsâ€¦ a few of which we were lucky to get our hands on.
settings.mob_text: thankfully, this iconic institution remains dedicated to maintaining and restoring ethical manufacturing in the United States
settings.text_2: these pieces, the hall cpo and enfield hunting jacket, are two projects we are so excited to have been able to apply American Woolen Companies quality and legacy to.
